page.title: 03The Marina
page.content: The Marina is down Woodrolf road near the water front. The boats are like dominoes in a line because there is hardly any space between them. The Marina is a private place where boats are kept but you have to pay to keep your boats in there. My Grandad used to put his boat in there but now he doesn't because he thought it was too expensive. People all over Colchester and Maldon area keep their boats moored at Tollesbury Marina. They are nearly all sailing boats. The Marina has been there about 14 years, the cruising club is opposite it. There are about 150 boats moored in the Marina. The Marina is tidal.
